alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Kenton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 10:11PM EDT until July 27 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT FOR KENTON...NORTHERN CAMPBELL...NORTHERN BOONE AND SOUTHERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 1011 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crestview Hills, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Covington, Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Fort Thomas, Newport, Edgewood, Alexandria, Elsmere, Cheviot, Fort Mitchell, Villa Hills, Highland Heights, Taylor Mill, Bellevue, Fort Wright, Dayton, Ludlow and Southgate. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky near mile marker 77. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 2. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 172 and 191. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 3. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
